desc: Donegal Bog Cotton is a Donegal-based natural cosmetics company. Everything is made by hand using natural and local ingredients. Quality soaps and cosmetics are created using the wildness of the county as inspiration.

layout.text:
Comhlacht Ceannbhán Dhún na nGall
Organic handmade cosmetics company, specialising in soap, moisturiser, lip balm and candles inspired by the natural wonders of Donegal.
Comhlacht cosmaidí orgánacha lámhdhéanta, a dhéanann speisialtóireacht i sópa, maothóirí, balsam
béil agus coinnle a bhfaigheann lucht a ndéanta inspioráid as iontaisí nádúrtha Dhún na nGall.
